net.theblackchamber.crypto.model

Class KeyConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.theblackchamber.crypto.model.KeyConfig

  • public class KeyConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used to configure key generation.

    • Constructor Detail

      • KeyConfig

        public KeyConfig()
        Constructor

      • KeyConfig

        public KeyConfig(java.io.File keyStoreFile,
         java.lang.String keyStorePassword,
         java.lang.Integer keySize,
         SupportedAlgorithms algorithm,
         java.lang.String keyEntryName)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        keyStoreFile - Key Store file to add a key to.
        keyStorePassword - Password to be used to secure the keystore or open the keystore if it aleady exists.
        keySize - Size in bits of the key to generate.
        algorithm - Algorithm the key is for
        keyEntryName - Entry name for the key in the keystore.
